page.title: 20LEIGH C. of E. SCHOOL
page.content: Leigh Church of England Primary School is a small church school which serves the parishes of four different churches. These churches are St. James, Tile Hill-St. John the Baptist, Westwood-St. Oswalds, Tile Hill and St. Stephens, Canley. There are 231 pupils in our school which are divided into 3 infant classes and 4 junior classes. Throughout the week our lessons cover all the different subjects taught in a primary school and after school we are able to attend various clubs such as dancing, gymnastics, padder tennis, archery and table tennis as well as football and netball practises for the school teams. Credit should be given to the junior pupils of Leigh Church of England School for all the work they have done in compiling the information for the B.B.C. Domesday Project.
